meanings.definition: A person who creates or devises something, especially a plan or story.
meanings.sent1: The talented concocters at the bakery made delicious pastries every morning.
meanings.sent2: The group of young concocters worked together to come up with a fun game for the party.
meanings.sent3: The clever concocters decided to prank their friend by hiding all his shoes.
meanings.sent4: The imaginative concocters weaved a magical world in their storybook.
meanings.sent5: The creative concocters painted a vivid picture with their words.

meanings.definition: To create or devise (a plan or story) skillfully.
meanings.sent1: She concocters a plan to surprise her best friend on her birthday.
meanings.sent2: The author concocters an exciting plot twist in the mystery novel.
meanings.sent3: The kids concocters a silly excuse for why they were late to school.
meanings.sent4: He concocters a brilliant strategy to win the chess tournament.
meanings.sent5: The chef concocters a new recipe using fresh ingredients.
